title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Madden Memories, Stafford Rams Impact, Rodgers and Russ Futures with Sam Farmer
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Madden Memories, Stafford Rams Impact, Rodgers and Russ Futures with Sam Farmer
description:
Colin explains how one of John Madden's cornerstone beliefs would benefit today's coaches (3:00). Then, L.A. Times NFL Writer Sam Farmer shares some of his favorite personal interactions with Madden (9:00), and his influence on the NFL's massive growth (23:00). He and Colin also discuss Matt Stafford's impact on the Rams (32:00), if Pete Carroll's style can still work in today's NFL (37:00), if Russell Wilson will be around for the Seattle rebuild (42:00), what team would be the best fit for Aaron Rodgers if he leaves Green Bay (48:00), which NFL opening is the most appealing (51:00), and if it's possible for USC to ever return to the level it was under Pete Carroll (54:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
